Articles.Content:
The progress thus far......

Actual YB-49 dimensions:

1. [**Wingspan**](https://www.google.co.uk/search?espv=2&biw=1440&bih=756&q=yb-49+wingspan&stick=H4sIAAAAAAAAAGOovnz8BQMDgzEHnxCnfq6-gVFhXmGFlkp2spV-YllmYklmfp5-YmZRclFiWkl8bn5Kao5VeWZeenFBYl6wxRSNiIibnOxcvsbLWLe76de8LwcASVzRcFAAAAA&sa=X&ved=0CJQBEOgTKAAwFWoVChMIsOrKzILUxgIVzgrbCh0eIQle)**:** 52 m

My craft dimensions:

![5L7fd8w.png](http://i.imgur.com/5L7fd8w.png)  
To do. Wing tips, and wing trailing edges. The size   
The fuel is kept in tanks inside the wings.  
![fXocke9.png](http://i.imgur.com/fXocke9.png)
the wings look a bit too straight and the uprights a bit small. (the reference i used) ![northrop-yb-49.png](http://www.the-blueprints.com/blueprints-depot/modernplanes/northrop/northrop-yb-49.png)
